game-file-check.not-available: Game file check result is not available

processes-check.not-available: Processes file check result is not available

client-check.all-valid: No problems found in the client.log
client-check.not-available: client.log check result is not available

check.not-started: Select a file to have it checked. Either a game.txt, client.log, processes.txt or a report directly.
check.in-progress: Loading... (This may take a few seconds)
check.invalid-file: The selected file is not valid.

NOT_EXTENDED_REPORT.message: The game data has been checked, but the hash check is not available.
possible-solutions: Create a extended report (This may take a while)

FILE_UNKNOWN.message: There are files in the GTA installation that may not belong to the game. (FILE_UNKNOWN)

RESHADE_DETECTED.message: Reshade was recognized in the game folder
possible-solutions: Remove Reshade from the game folder and put it in the alt:V Mods folder instead

ENB_DETECTED.message: ENB was recognized in the game folder
possible-solutions: Remove ENB from the game folder and put it in the alt:V Mods folder instead

POOL_IS_FULL.message: A internal pool is full which can cause crashs

FILE_HASH_DOES_NOT_MATCH.message: Some hashes from the GTA installation are not correct. (FILE_HASH_DOES_NOT_MATCH)

REMOVE_BULLGUARD.message: BullGuard blocks alt:V from running on your system

REMOVE_ESET.message: ESET blocks alt:V from running on your system

REMOVE_SOPHOS.message: Sophos blocks alt:V from running on your system

REMOVE_AVAST.message: Avast blocks alt:V from running on your system

DISABLE_OVERLAYS.message: Overlays like Overwolf cause alt:V to crash after few seconds/minutes after launch
possible-solutions: Disable Overlays like Overwolf, Discord Overlay, Nvidia Overlay etc.

REMOVE_ONEDRIVE.message: OneDrive cause errors with the Rockstar Games Launcher

REMOVE_OR_DISABLE_AVIRA.message: Avira might blocks alt:V from running on your system
possible-solutions: Add alt:V as an exception for Avira

REMOVE_OR_DISABLE_BITDEFENDER.message: Bitdefender might blocks alt:V from running on your system
possible-solutions: Add alt:V as an exception for Bitdefender

CLOSE_OPERA_GX.message: Opera GX may cause alt:V not to start

CLOSE_CORSAIR_ICUE.message: Corsair iCUE may cause alt:V not to start
